project.name: Confluence Bundled Plugins External Library
project.description: Builds the bundled plugins WAR for all the plugins that are outside the core repo

bannedDependencies.message: Bundled plugins must have _provided_ scope to be properly bundled. Using _compile_ or _runtime_ will end up in WEB-INF/lib
Plugins should not suck in dependencies on core Confluence classes
Do not include the whitelist-api-plugin here: it's a confluence core dependency, its packages are exported out of the system bundle so must not also be deployed as a bundle
